description: Try our easy to follow Ricotta, Spinach & Smashed Bean Quesadilla recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Quesadilla,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Low salt,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Sesame free,Father's Day,High protein,High fibre,Sandwich press,Quick & easy lunch,Tomato,Low fat,Spinach,Peanut free
name: Ricotta, Spinach & Smashed Bean Quesadilla Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place beans in a small bowl and roughly mash with a fork. Add the tomato and stir to combine.

Place wrap on a clean work surface. Spread ricotta over one half of the wrap. Top with bean mixture and spinach leaves. Fold to enclose. Toast quesadilla in sandwich press for 2 minutes or until golden. Cut into wedges and serve.
